thread.title: Customer LN
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Customer LN

author: Customer LN
title: Customer LN
text: I would give them the worst review because the minute I placed a large order they emailed me a coupon, Buy 3 get 1 FREE with FREE shipping. When I called to asked if they would apply the coupon to my order with the FREE shipping she said "NO!" and the lady was really rude on top of it! What bad business people. Never again!
